text: Namoni Majuli (also called Lower Majuli) is the lower part of Majuli, Jorhat, Assam. It starts from Kamalabari to lower most Ahotguri mouza. But years ago this mouza has been vanished due to severe flood erosion of Brahmaputra river. ==See also== *Madhya Majuli *Ujoni Majuli *List of educational institutes in Majuli *List of villages in Majuli ==External links== Category:Geography of Assam Category:Majuli Category:Majuli district
title: Namoni Majuli
